Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were friendly this is really what i appreciated Location was safe and convenient by Metro Nearby there s a Chinese restaurant which appears to be a Japanese so overall it was a good experience

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No room service every things you need it you should go to reception to collect Bad staff on reception they don t have customer service skills prices so expensive overall hotel view train station
Positive_Review: Hotel was next to metro station

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Staff adapted taxi to train station and told us it is 15 EUR but driver told 40 EUR after we arrived to station
Positive_Review: Clean and comfortable Very near to metro station

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The underground would shake the room Unfortunately you cannot do anything about that once we figured out what it was everything was fine
Positive_Review: Bed comfy staff helpfull

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Could not find any fault with this hotel will stay there again
Positive_Review: Family room we stayed in was excellent there was a curtain in the room which you could close off which gave the kids and parents privacy mini fridge and microwave also in the room Excellent breakfast with great choices kids love their hot chocolate for breakfast

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Buying food in the hotel was extremely expensive
Positive_Review: The location was good especially for the metro and trams The room was nice The reception staff were brilliant and helpef us lots with planning our days out

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The breakfast was quite frugal and I felt it was nt value for money The breakfast area has limited seating capacity and becomes quite a challenge to find a place to sit
Positive_Review: The location is fantastic just above the metro station the tram station is only 50 meters away The place is absolutely safe and in a nice residential neighborhood There are several super markets convenience stores pharmacies around the property The rooms are comfortable equipped with a microwave coffee maker etc overall we had a memorable stay

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: I wish there was a airport shuttle Although the hotel is modern it didn t seem to have enough places to put things in the bathroom
Positive_Review: The staff was helpful and friendly The beds were comfy

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Basic breakfast No swimming pool No inhouse restaurant
Positive_Review: Very clean and contemporary room Great bathroom with excellent shower Very convenient location with metro just a minute away

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The guy at the reception named Alejandro was super helpful with everything we were a big family group of 8 people and he was always up for anything we asked I also forgot my watch at the hotel and he kindly send it to me via post to my home Staff in general were kind and friendly Hotel is nice and close to the station so it s easy to get anywhere by metro or tram Breakfast it s nice also not so many restaurants around the hotel to go for dinner at night Overall a good experience

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Wasn t as close to the attractions as I d hoped Also parking is horrible Either you pay less and park at a hospital which closes your car in at 8 pm or you pay more and walk fifteen minutes
Positive_Review: Staff and breakfast were great The hotel was clean and directly next to the metro Eifel tower a fifteen minute ride on the metro

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Parking was not easily accessible and not very safe The seating area near elevators was littered with used plates and bottles
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed and room with A C Nespresso machine in room was great Staff was helpful with directions to various Paris sights Breakfast selection was good Metro directly out front door of hotel

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Rooms can be slightly bigger specially for the family The photos on the website give that impression Some utensils for heating up stuff in microwave will be great
Positive_Review: Location is great for transport as well as food options nearby Staff is friendly and helpful Breakfast was very good

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: We did not have a good experience with Holiday Inn last time we stayed in Paris so we decided we would book a hotel with nicer and comfortable room We browsed booking com and found this Novotel closer to where i had to attend a conference and the pictures of the rooms looked really good When we reached there the actual room surpassed our expectations It was very spacious and very clean pretty much comparable to a 4star The shower and bath was very clean and spacious and the drainage system was really good which is often not good in hotels They cleaned the room everyday and topped up the tea bar too the ambience of the lobby and hotel rooms is very nice we stayed with two kids and even though there was extra bed for kids there was ample space Metro is just outside and it takes you directly to champs lys es connects you to other lines that take you directly to Musee du louvre or Notre Dame and other attractions so you do not spend a lot of time travelling Staff is very helpful and friendly they even kept our luggage after checkout while our flight was late and we needed to hover around without carrying heavy luggage with us I would definitely give it a 5 star an d stay with them again there are enough cheap restaurants near the hotel and really good bakery right in front of it

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Sometimes there was not enough tables bring breakfast time Scrambled eggs were not tasty while all the rest was pretty good They should be canceled from menu or replaced by natural eggs
Positive_Review: Perfect location in front of metro exit New hotel with clean rooms Very clever design of hotel and room interiors Good breakfast like in France Very king and helpful personnel

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: we didnt stay longer
Positive_Review: A few steps from the main entrance you had access to the metro and could be anywhere in the city in 10 20mins Was close to Orly airport if your coming via this airport The rooms were big and very clean maybe even huge for Paris standards we stayed in a similar rated hotel during our stay and was very small compared to here Some people complained about the metro tram we were on level 1 and despite some noise and vibrations this had no effect on my sleep and i m a light sleeper at the best of times A few shops over the road were handy for supplies and a really nice bakery if your not having breakfast in the hotel Staff were always friendly and helpful Would come back here again if we visited Paris

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The rattle of the entire building every time a train goes past
Positive_Review: Impeccably clean well equipped rooms Shops and lovely bakery right opposite Decent location with Metro station right outside Just 12 15 minute Metro ride into the middle of Paris

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The house keeping was poor and their was not car parking places near to the hotel also no room service and they don t have restaurants for lunch and dinner
Positive_Review: The room was quiet big compared to oters

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: As we where next to the train line having the trains rattling along keeping me awake until silly hours And then they started early I didn t get to much sleep
Positive_Review: The hotel staff were brilliant

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Place for the Breakfast is much too small for such a huge hotel The breakfast itself was very good and there is a fight every morning for the places
Positive_Review: Nice place good value for the money

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: There is no play area in the hotel for kids I think they need to communicate more around the hotel about the busy time for breakfast as it gets very busy down there Not in the centre of Paris
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful Public transport Tram Metro both outside the door Clean hotel Breakfast good

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Breakfast was ok ish Location is slightly off the center need 2 trains to the touristic destinations in Paris
Positive_Review: The room was very comfortable toilet and bathroom were very clean Beds were the best Would I stay there again Yes

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Large modern and clean rooms Friendly staff Very good location Metro station is just in front of the hotel Easy access from CDG airport however Orly is much closer to this property Many restaurants around Across the street there is bakery shop very convenient if you don t want to have breakfast in the hotel

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: NB Location is at Porte de Vanves not at Porte de Versailles Breakfast space too small crowded and noisy at 9 10 a m
Positive_Review: Breakfast room size facilities and great personnel

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: A breakfast is served actually in a lobby area but it looks like there is no other option
Positive_Review: This hotel is an ideal solution for everyone who wants to explore Paris Just 10 meters from the door you have a metro line 13 station Porte de Vannves The train goes to the center of Paris in less than 10 minutes The hotel and our room were very clean We had a spacious room 2 adults two young kids with comfy beds large LED TV on a moving stand Room was full equipped fridge micro wave coffee machine hair dryer free wifi The staff very helpful and kind We enjoyed all our 7 days stay We can recommend this hotel and we would come there again for sure

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: There are not enough tables and chairs for those eating breakfast Families were having to sit separately and people were having to move half way through their breakfast to be seated together Need more tables
Positive_Review: Size of family room was excellent Having a fantastic shower and a bath was great Staff were extremely helpful The choice of breakfast was excellent the coffee and scrambled eggs delicious

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The only thing is the breakfast place near to the reception not enough tables in the morning There s nothing special in the neighbourhood but we didn t mind since the metro station was jus by the hotel entrance
Positive_Review: The Hotel is very comfortable and nicelooking The staff were very friendly and helpful The bed very comfortable room big bathroom big and clean with toileteries coffe mashine in the room Really enjoyed the stay The continental breakfast was good eveyone found sth they liked We booked 3 rooms and stayed in rooms just next to each other Payed 684E for 3rooms with breakfast two nights 12ppl There is a small restaurant and a small shop exactly opposite the hotel The metro station is just next to the hotel Really enjoyed the stay would stay there again Thank you very much

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The speed of the Internet was good but every day you have to register again and again and that was annoying
Positive_Review: Everything was fine We didn t use the restaurant in the hotel that why I cannot say anything about The metro station is just front of the hotel

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No car park you need to use other facilities around 10 min walk should you be willing to park your car at sought after place Train line very close making some noise to be heard even in the hotel building
Positive_Review: Very helpful staff that would do everything to make your stay pleasant Metro station at the door

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were helpful and friendly The metro was right outside the hotel and very easy to use to get about The hotel was clean and rooms were spacious and well equipped with everything we needed Would definitely go back

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: breakfast zone is quite small since there is in the lobby the quality could be better for a 4 star hotel
Positive_Review: good location just next to the metro station and the tram station Porte de vanves there are several supermarket around such as carrefour market carrefour city cross thr bridge spacious room big bathroom comfortable bed very friendly and helpful staff it is really worth for the money

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Beds and pillows were hard even by European standards The eggs were cream eggs of some type and I couldn t eat them The breakfast was pretty basic Upgraded to the executive suite and it wasn t worth it Ended up spending more time on the metro then we would have preferred if we stayed closer to the city center
Positive_Review: It was right by the metro New and clean Very helpful and friendly staff GREAT shower

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: It was mentioned hotel is 3 km from Effel tower but it was 7 5 km I cancel other hotel which was near Effel tower I was upset with the distence of all tourist spots it was waste of time and money both I wrote email to booking customer service but no one responded to my mail and I didn t expect his from booking how they can put the hotel description which is provided to them without verifing the details
Positive_Review: Lots of Good food options

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were so helpful and friendly and all spoke English There is a bus and metro just on your doorstep and a fantastic bakery across the road The rooms were spacious if you are traveling with your family There are many restaurants in walking distance This Hotel is great value for money and the staff made our stay even better I would highly recommend it

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location was perfect Near by M13 Porte De Vanves metro station Staff was excellent and very helpful to guide us in Paris Room was clean and comfortable to stay together with our 6 years old kid Separating curtain was a plus in the room Breakfast was ok

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Room rates and breakfast are over charged no hotel parking lovcation is far from city less staff in the reception especially in the night time

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Small recepetion and breakfastroom its like sitting in the lobby and having breakfast Location right by the trainstation which vibrated through the building No charm and a bit expensive
Positive_Review: Very nice room

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: no restaurant and bar in the hotel at site
Positive_Review: very good and comfortable accommodation for business purpose preferably close to Expo Paris right next to metro in close reach to anywhere

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Long wait for table to free up for the breakfast and response time from staff to get the table cleaned

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: A good manual how to work the ventilation in your room would be nice
Positive_Review: Practical hotel with modern interior and furniture Nice atmosphere Clean and functional Nice and friendly well trained staff

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No English teabags Breakfast a little unorganised and busy
Positive_Review: Rooms were great The kids loved the shower and had lots of space to play in the room Fantastic location although be careful finding it as address is misleading Staff were lovely and booked us into a beautiful restaurant

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Very little space for guests to eat breakfast Breakfast items not replenished often
Positive_Review: Property was far out but well linked to public transport Very convenient to travel around

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: It was not a 4 star as described on the web site It is more like a low 3 star by Irish or English standards The room was not a sweet it was a normal size room with a double and two single beds crammed into it
Positive_Review: The price was good for a family of 4

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No negative points really
Positive_Review: This hotel was absolutely fantastic I will stay again and again We can ear the train vibrations but the settings make you forget about it Kudos

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Dirty room Pictures were a lie Discourteous staff Very very expensive Not worth of money Please stay away from this property hopeless breakfast

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Poor Service at breakfast could not meet the demands i e Cutlery food etc Extra sofa bed and pillows were hard uncomfortable although near transport be warned if your ligh sleeper the tram noise may keep you awake

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: room wasn t cleaned once
Positive_Review: why pay hefty latin quarter rates for a mediocre botique hotelwhen you can be there in 10 min and get a world class hotel treatment

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Lower bed of the sofa is quite small narrow good until year 8 Sometimes you can hear the sound of metro RER As we were on the 5th floor it was not disturbing
Positive_Review: Delicious plenty breakfast Room is good for family with two kids Underground station is right before the hotel easy to reach the center Very good accommodation

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: You are not in the centre of Paris and don t really get the real Paris feel when you walk out the door Not many restaurants or patisseries nearby But easy to get everywhere by the metro There is no crockery or cutlery in the rooms we had to ask for china cups plates and spoons to make coffee and breakfast etc
Positive_Review: The staff were lovely and very helpful The beds were very comfortable and rooms were spotlessly clean There is a safe in the room the metro entrance is right outside the door and there is a Carrefour supermarket about a 5 minute walk away Nespresso cofffee machine and microwave and fridge in the room

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: I like everything the train is a little loud outside but that is it
Positive_Review: Everything hotel was beautiful the staff was very helpful the train station is right outside

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Air conditioning is set centrally for us to warm in the room but acceptable at the end
Positive_Review: Very nice hotel personel ready to help on every request Nice location just 30 meters from Metro Station so within 15 minutes you are just in the heart of Paris New clean hotel good breakfast

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: I was very upset with Booking com because I searched and did a booking for 5 persons in the same room with 3 weeks in advance 24 hours before my arrival Bookings com sent me an email informing me that we could only be 4 in the room and that I would have to pay for another room for the 5th person Not even a call just an email
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The first room we were given hadn t had any of the bins emptied and there were suspicious hairs in the bath This was resolved quickly as we were immediately moved rooms and the receptionist was very apologetic The room had a coffee machine fridge kettle and microwave but no cutlery plates bowls cups etc Brought food back one night and had to go down to reception to ask for all these items The room had two huge TVs One on a stand and one wall mounted seemed pointless really Also the remote annoying would operate both TVs so you had to be very careful how you changed channel or you could accidentally switch on the other to Wall mounted shower gel body wash but no shampoo conditioner etc supplied which was disappointing Small table next to kitchen area in the room was handy but only had one chair not enough for a family of four
Positive_Review: Check in was quick and children were very pleased with their complimentary cuddly toy key ring Hotel was modern and rooms were big Beds were comfy and the nearby metro was very handy to get into central Paris Area seemed nice Ate at a gorgeous cafe bar on the first night after a recommendation from reception Supermarkets near by and lovely restaurants etc about a 10 15 minute walk away Lovely shower and bath Breakfast continental style was plentiful and good quality Constantly restocked and a good variety Staff friendly and helpful when asked

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fantastic location right on top of metro station and across the street from a tram Great clean rooms and friendly staff Bakery across street is fantastic

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Just above the metro station convenient but noisy and shaky in the early morning So no sleeping after 7am
Positive_Review: The quality of the suites were like never had before and i travel a lot

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The location is too far from the downtown Also the breakfast place is too tight There is no ironing stuff in the yet there is one tiny ironing room with one ironing table for the whole guests in the 10th floor
Positive_Review: The Cleanliness of the hotel is great The staff were very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: located directly above a metro station so every time a train passes by the room vibrates the sound is heard through breakfast also basic could be better As i was on the first floor felt the train even more
Positive_Review: Room was nice comfortable staff polite helpful area is nice

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: Very nice hotel wide room and very clean nice staff in the reception very helpful in the breakfast breakfast is fresh and healthy wide variety and very nice for kids room service is very nice quiet hotel the metro station is by the hotel wall it is very very near

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were asked when we arrived if we would like to upgrade for an extra cost and I am so glad we did we got one of 3 rooms on the top floor the executive suite and the views were amazing

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Sometime we hear noise of metro but not loud
Positive_Review: The Hotel is in very good location having metro just at the door step rooms are big enough and very comfortable and the cleaning in the hotel is super To add the hotel is having strong WiFi connection which is very much required

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: It would have a lot more comfortable if the Dining Area was more spacious
Positive_Review: The room service is excellent and the bed is really comfortable Also the metro station is just outside the main entrance on the line that takes directly to the Champs Elysees

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Bit pricey but not too bad considering it is Paris after all
Positive_Review: Location is good room was fantastic Great facilities in the room including microwave kettle fridge and coffee machine

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The coffee machine was very dusty We were only given two small paper cups No plates or cutlery Sudden City Tax charge The breakfast looked a bit lacklustre
Positive_Review: The size of the room was great quite clean The shower was nice and spacious and clean The bed was comfortable We could see the Eiffel Tower They left us some sweets which I guess they didn t have to do Close to the Sunday market and also an antiques car boot sale Right next to Port de Vanves metro and tram station Free wifi was very fast and with a strong signal

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: 1 they didn t proved the gust card to enter all attraction 2 the breakfast was little bet poor
Positive_Review: good location it is near the under ground station which is make easier to visit all attractions in Paris helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The best part of it was that it was close to a Sunday market and residential area so you could get a feeling as what local people do on the normal days Also very close to the metro so no problem to get to any location Also if you like to jog in the morning the streets and the parks close by are great and very safe

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The propert is good and clean and the staff are very good as we Wer tourist and didn t no our way round they sorted everything out like taxis etc and would recommend this place brilliant

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The lobby was small
Positive_Review: The location was so near by train station only 10 meters distance OMG so big wow Really highly recomended for who need transportation by train We loved to have a microwave in the room That eased us The room was big and clean Also there were bath tube shower room and toilet in separate part Perfect

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Nothing everything was magnificient
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect for our family Perfect location Room size was unbelievable All facilities just top notch

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Breakfast is good but not enough space so we had to wait for a table to be cleaned every day It is somewhat remote so you need to take the metro to go to the more lively neighborhoods
Positive_Review: Excellent value for money new clean very close to metro station I can definitely recommend this hotel

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Everything was fine
Positive_Review: I was in this hotel with my family between August 20 28 2016 Hotel is 10 meters away from metro station Porte de Vanves In France especially in Paris staying at a hotel near a metro station is very important We had no problem of transportation There are 4 5 stops from Porte de Vanves to Montparnesse which is one of the most central stations of Paris and 8 9 stops to Champ Elysees Each and every staff was always smiling and helpful They both helped us about hotel issues and answered all our questions about places and transportation They were really sincere They also speak English fluently this is important for non French speakers to make the communication easier The rooms were very clean Althugh the hotel is located very near to train and metro stations there is no problem of noise The size of the room was enough for us 2 adults one 12 year old child There is an uninterrupted and free wi fi connection both in the rooms and lobby area The check out hour was twelve and our return flight was in the evening We asked them to keep our luggages after check out for a few hours and they accepted this in a very friendly manner To sum up if I go to Paris again I would prefer this hotel again

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Windows Toilets have no sink so though they look clean hygene is very questionable Much smaller rooms than the other Suite Novotels I have been to
Positive_Review: Comfortable Bed

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Bathroom door was slightly broken awkwardly designed Hit lamp or desk every time entering or exiting it
Positive_Review: Clean Saw top of Eiffel Tower from our room Shower facilities were pretty good

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The refrigerator had food and drinks from previous guest not very clean The cleaning staff kept leaving stuff at our room one day it was a mop the other day there were detergents in the shower Breakfast is not included and costs 15 euros much cheaper to eat outside
Positive_Review: The staff was great very nice and helpful The room was spacious The metro is at the entrance of the hotel The hotel facilities are new and modern Good WiFi reception in the room Overall the staff made the difference They were helped with everything we needed If we come back it is mainly thanks to them

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: they don t serve lunch and dinner but there was a fridge near reception that you could buy microwave food and some snacks but it was pricey
Positive_Review: The room was big and very clean and modern Staff were so friendly and helpfull Undergrand was in front of hotel entrance door there was some shops and resturant around I will stay in this hotel if i come to Paris again

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Breakfast area during weekend was over crowded Too many guests were trying to eat at the same time and the service was not prepared for quick cleaning It took us almost 10 minutes before we find the free table and the same amount of time to have the table ready
Positive_Review: Rooms are comfortable and very clean You could not expect more from the room Metro station is just few meters from the hotel

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff brought extra blankets without problems Brand new hotel extremely clean and very nice Great that two kids under 16 stay for free Excellent noise isolation one doesn t hear the nearby railway or car traffic at all Location on top of a metro station Relatively cheap underground parking available but 10 minutes away on foot

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: They charged us with city taxes which was already included in our booking and paid They also charged us for extra 20 in addition to the price asked by our reservation at the time of booking 3 weeks before the reservation No place to park your car and unload your luggage to hotel
Positive_Review: It was clean A metro station 13 is in front of the hotel

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: A very spacious family room with microwave and fridge All of the staff are helpful and extended their extra help David on night shift has helped us booked our transport to the airport at the lowest cost We will definitely comeback and surely I will recommend this hotel

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: There was no parking at the hotel but we didn t need one
Positive_Review: The location was ok I thought it would be closer to the center of Paris There were traintracks next to the hotel Sometimes I heard the trains but it didn t bother me My son loves trains so he was extremely happy about it When we went into the center we could take tram or metro We once took a taxi and it wasn t expensive We bought 3 day pass to the metro trams

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The matras of the bedsofa was hard The room was good but could have been an little bit bigger 3 persons
Positive_Review: The hotel was overall good Friendly and helpfull staff Breakfast was good The coffee machine was excellent Everything refilled on time

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: There is no elevator to go down to the subway station so it requires some physical exercises to carry up and down luggage
Positive_Review: I love the contemporary design of the property the facility of the bathroom is super The location of the hotel is right beside the entrance of the subway It s not trouble to transfer to main point of interests by subway I feel safe about the locked front gate of hotel when we came back late and you only can enter with your own card

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: We don t recommend this hotel to no one traveling from USA
Positive_Review: Nothing to like about this hotel bad aircondtion small room nothing to eat during breakfast elevator does not work at night and you need to take the stirs to third floor Expensive for nothing comparing to other surrounding hotels in the same area

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Children was hoping to have a playroom but it was not a big deal

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Housekeeping was great except that they sometimes seem to use old cleaning rags So the floor sometimes gets smelly
Positive_Review: Everything was fabulous The location which is two steps from Porte de Vanvas metro station the friendly staff the beautiful modern design of the hotel the cosy bedrooms

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Although the windows in the hotel are soundproof you can hear the metro which runs every 5 minutes from 5 30 a m we had a room on the second floor We got a room where a toilet was a single room without a sink to wash hands we had to go to the bathrooom Some of the tables are situated in front of the reception desk so it may happen that you eat your breakfast near the lobby
Positive_Review: New hotel big and comfortable beds in the room clean room breakfast with a plenty of choice time for breakfast is from 6 a m to 11 a m nice staff they are ready to help you at any time multimedia table for the children in the lobby they may play while you check in or check out

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: the location was very near to the metro station and since the hotel is new the room was also very good even the staff was very helpful both at the breakfast and at the reception

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Late night the noise not too bad but the noise from the subway passing You have a very helpful staff The best
Positive_Review: The staff the bed the shower and great water pressure

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: I stayed for a total of 8 nights in the hotel There are 2 soap dispensers in the bathroom One at the bath tub and one at the standing shower area When I reached on my 1st day I noticed that there was very little soap left in the shower dispenser and it was not a full bottle I had thought the housekeeper would notice it and replenish by 2nd day But it was not done till the 7th day which was really disappointing Meanwhile I simply squeezed soap out into a cup from the dispenser at the bath tub for my use This is an example of a small detail that is important to the customer but overlooked I also disliked the fact that a senior employee at the hotel is unfriendly to guests I assumed he is someone ranked manager as I saw him on more than a few mornings mingling with staff He doesn t make eye contact with guests or greets them
Positive_Review: I loved that the family room was spacious and the fact it was so near to a metro exit Even though it is abit further away from the city centre it is still not too bad It is in a quiet but relatively safe area And the Chinese Vietnamese restaurant nearby was a surprise bonus The staff at the reception were good and especially one male staff who went the extra mile to get ice for my husband on a few nights for our soft drinks in the room He even provided an ice bucket

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Positive_Review: Even if the train passes right by the hotel the rooms are well isolated and therefore very quiet The design of the room is nice and I specifically liked the idea of the moving TV as well as the air conditioner not being oriented towards the bed as in most of the hotels Staff was nice breakfast ok Easy access to the city center by subway

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Kitchen utility is worst If one Microwave and tiny fidge can be designated as Kitchen No Bowl No Plates not even spoon Cooking place is very small This place should enlisted under Hotel in Booking com not in Apartments with Kitchen facility If you want stay for couple of days with your family and wish to prepare your food by yourself this is worst choice Another thing you have to pay full charge during check in before entering the room So you do not have any choice after Only facility location is just near the Metro station
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The location is not the greatest when you have kids You cannot walk around the area at night during the day we were comfortable
Positive_Review: The facility was clean and comfortable The staff was fantastic The location is nicely located next to a Metro so it was very easy to get to the tourist areas

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Room was crampy Basic facilities provided without any luxury My credit card debited without my approval unexpectedly before my arrival I intended to pay using another card so had to get refund on my booking card I am not sure when the amount will be credited back
Positive_Review: All the facilities were satisfactory

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The toilet is separate to the bathroom which was odd and there was no extra sink with the toilet so had to go to the bathroom to wash hands every time Also ironing facilities are on another floor
Positive_Review: The location was excellent on the doorstep of the metro station Large spacious bedroom and very clean and modern

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles

Positive_Review: Large well equipped room very clean with a metro station on the doorstep

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: Breakfast was just ok Very ordinary Not up to the standard of other Novotel
Positive_Review: Room was good Hotel is next to metro line 13 The hotel staff was very kind and extremely helpful Will visit again Though a bit expensive but I guess it s Paris

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: I know some people might be put off with noise from metro but it didnt bother us as we re used to city noise The only slight negative about the hotel was level of cleanliness Altough clean there were scuff marks on doors and bath I personally like to walk into a hotel room and feel like i m the first person to use it Having said that i do believe that the general standard of cleaning has gone down over the last few years in all hotels
Positive_Review: I was with my husband and 8 year old and had the superior suite which was perfect for our needs Metro was just outside the hotel so access to travel around was perfect Pedro at reception was very friendly and super helpful

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
Negative_Review: The food available in the hotel was very pricey but it was literally the only drawback
Positive_Review: The room we had was fab Clean spacious and modern The room had a comfy bed bright bathroom with a great shower and the room was huge with a sofa area with an additional TV The location of the hotel is perfect with a metro stop right outside the door One of the nicest hotels I have stayed in

Hotel_Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
